Subject: Creating Safe Spaces
Description: How can we create safe spaces for people of all varieties at the convention, and in our lives outside of fandom? Join a discussion with our staff (including the con chair) and those who have ideas on how we can do better on inclusivity and promoting consent.  Speakers include:Nuri Gocay, April Nance, Scott Kennedy, Karen Morand, Dawn Kuczwara - Track: Penguicon Events  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
